A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They’re completely destroying my childhood. If they are going to produce this hot garbage\, the least they could have done was leave the original characters out of it. Instead\, the original trilogy and everything that came from it was flushed down the toilet\, the characters’ lives were wasted\, their struggle was for nothing. I could have given the movie a couple stars for the effects and visuals but the fact that it was supposed to be a Star Wars movie makes me want to give it a negative rating. Just another in a big line of disappointments\, I feel sick.
